title: Spa/Hot Tub, Fitness Center, Pool | 2+2.5 TH in Beautiful Covina
posting_body: ['Welcome to Brookwood Apartments in Covina, CA nestled at the foot of the San Gabriel Mountains, about 20 miles east of Los Angeles, in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley.', "You'll love our proximity to freeways, the\xa0Metrolink\xa0station, Citrus College, and APU.", 'Our Brookwood apartments are infused with natural elements like lush gardens and a relaxing pond.', 'When you stay in one of our amazing apartments for rent at Brookwood,\xa0feel free to relax in the pool and spa, entertain friends in the barbecue areas, work out in the community fitness center, or work or play in our clubhouse.', '\xa0Each of our apartments comes equipped with a private patio or balcony, breakfast bar, ceiling fan, and dishwasher.', 'Select residences also have cozy fireplaces for those cold winter nights.', 'Call today to schedule your personal tour!', 'CONTACT INFORMATION', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'LOCATION', '18537 Arrow Highway Covina, CA 91722', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Refrigerator Available', '- Central Air*', '- Private Balconies and Patios', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Fireplace*', '- Dishwasher', '- Disposal', '- Ceiling Fan', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Covered Parking', '- Swimming Pool', '- Multiple Water Features', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Close to the Metro', '- Clubhouse', '- Public Parks Nearby', '- Soothing Spa/Hot Tub', '- Fitness Center', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Lush Landscaping', 'LOCATION BENEFITS', 'Nearby Freeways: 210 Freeway, 39-Hwy', "Restaurants: Clearman's North Woods Inn of Covina, City Grill, El Matador Authentic Restaurant, T's Lounge, Falak Hookah Lounge", 'Entertainment: Kelby Park, Covina Park, AMC Covina 17, Foothill Cinema Stadium 10', 'Close Shopping: Covina Town Square, Palm Center, Covina Plaza, Edgewood Shopping Center, Superior Grocers, ALDI, Baja Ranch Market, El Super, Stater Bros. Markets', 'Schools: Charter Oak HS, Fairvalley HS, Northview HS, Cypress ES, Covina ES, Royal Oak Middle School, Citrus College, Azusa Pacific University College', 'Close Cities: Citrus, Charter Oak, Glendora, Azusa, Vincent, Irwindale', 'PET POLICY', 'Cats Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'LEASE TERMS:', '12 Months Preferred.', 'Other Lease Terms May Be Considered.']
